com.packt.webstore.controller

Class CartRestController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.packt.webstore.controller.CartRestController

  • @Controller
 @RequestMapping(value="rest/cart")
public class CartRestController
extends java.lang.Object
    The REST controller class is using rest services The class provides methods for creating, reading and updating the Cart object
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Joanna Stecz / j.stecz@wp.pl, Dorota Jankowiec / dorota.jankowiec@gmail.com
